item.title: widgetframe
item.description: R的画图包千千万，其中有许多优秀的交互式画图、数据展示包，如leaflet; dygraphs; DT等。但是如果要线上使用这些结果常常存在JS加载冲突的问题，因为加载这些包同时要引入许多相关的JS库 其中一个解决方法就是把相关的R展示模块当作一个iframe来处理，具体操作已有包widgetframe，使用frameWidget将输出结果进行包装 示例 leaflet地图效果 library(leaflet) library(widgetframe) ## 载入需要的程辑包：htmlwidgets l <- leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l) {"x":{"url":"/post/2018-02-20-widgetframe_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_example-leaflet.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false,"lazyload":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} dygraphs交互图表 library(dygraphs) ts <- dygraph(nhtemp, main = "New Haven Temperatures", height=250, width='95%') frameWidget(ts) {"x":{"url":"/post/2018-02-20-widgetframe_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_example-dygraphs.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false,"lazyload":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} DT数据表格 library(DT) dt <- datatable( head(iris, 20), options = list( columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 5)), pageLength = 5, lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20)), fillContainer = T) frameWidget(dt, height = 350, width = '95%') {"
